message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I think that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,200 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need at least $9,000 to make this worthwhile. Let's meet in the middle.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $8,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $8,500. That's my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower.
